gobblin.runtime.mapreduce

Class MRTaskStateTracker

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.google.common.util.concurrent.AbstractIdleService
      • gobblin.runtime.AbstractTaskStateTracker
        • gobblin.runtime.mapreduce.MRTaskStateTracker
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Service, TaskStateTracker

    public class MRTaskStateTracker
extends AbstractTaskStateTracker
    A concrete extension to AbstractTaskStateTracker for Hadoop MapReduce based runtime.
